mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event(eventNum, userCode, subject, content, price, StartDate, endDate, thumbnail, hitCount, regDate) VALUES (event_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userCode}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{price}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{thumbnail}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT eventNum, subject, content, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(regDate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS regDate, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS endDate FROM event ORDER BY eventNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET subject=#{subject}, price=#{price}, content=#{content}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, thumbnail=#{thumbnail} WHERE eventNum = #{eventNum}
